trophies.name: All trophies obtained
trophies.description: Obtained all Horizon Zero Dawn trophies.

trophies.name: Stealth killed 10 machines
trophies.description: Performed a stealth kill on 10 machines.

trophies.name: 3 Strikes From Above
trophies.description: Killed 3 enemies using the Strike from Above skill.

trophies.name: Tore off 10 components
trophies.description: Detached 10 components from machines during combat.

trophies.name: 10 Vulnerable machine kills
trophies.description: Killed 10 machines weak to Fire while burning, or weak to Freeze while frozen.

trophies.name: Tore off 5 heavy weapons
trophies.description: Detached 5 heavy weapons from machines during combat.

trophies.name: 7 types of machine overridden
trophies.description: Unlocked and used the overrides for 7 different types of machine.

trophies.name: Headshot 30 human enemies
trophies.description: Killed 30 human enemies by landing headshots on them.

trophies.name: Downed 23 Grazer dummies
trophies.description: Found and knocked over all of the Grazer training dummies in the Nora region.

trophies.name: First Modification
trophies.description: Used a Weapon Coil or Outfit Weave on a modifiable weapon or outfit.

trophies.name: All Acquisition machines killed
trophies.description: Killed at least one of every type of Acquisition machine.

trophies.name: All Recon machines killed
trophies.description: Killed at least one of every type of Reconnaissance machine.

trophies.name: All Combat machines killed
trophies.description: Killed at least one of every type of Combat machine.

trophies.name: All Transport machines killed
trophies.description: Killed at least one of every type of Transport machine.

trophies.name: Reached level 10
trophies.description: Reached player level 10.

trophies.name: Reached level 25
trophies.description: Reached player level 25.

trophies.name: Reached level 40
trophies.description: Reached player level 40.

trophies.name: Reached level 50
trophies.description: Reached player level 50.

trophies.name: All Skills learned
trophies.description: Learned all available skills.

trophies.name: First Tallneck Overridden
trophies.description: Scaled a Tallneck and accessed its information.

trophies.name: First Bandit Camp cleared
trophies.description: Took back a settlement from a bandit clan.

trophies.name: First Core Overridden
trophies.description: Reached the Core of a Cauldron and accessed its information.

trophies.name: All Suns at one Ground
trophies.description: Earned at least a Half Sun mark in all three trials at one Hunting Ground.

trophies.name: Blazing Suns at one Ground
trophies.description: Earned a Blazing Sun mark in all three trials at one Hunting Ground.

trophies.name: First Corrupted Zone cleared
trophies.description: Killed all the corrupted machines in a Corrupted Zone.

trophies.name: All Tallnecks Overridden
trophies.description: Scaled all of the Tallnecks and accessed their information.

trophies.name: Cleared all the Bandit Camps
trophies.description: Took back all settlements from the bandit clans.

trophies.name: All Cores Overridden
trophies.description: Reached the Core of every Cauldron and accessed the information within.

trophies.name: All Suns at all Grounds
trophies.description: Earned at least a Half Sun mark in all trials at all of the Hunting Grounds.

trophies.name: Blazing Suns at all Grounds
trophies.description: Earned a Blazing Sun mark in all trials at all of the Hunting Grounds.

trophies.name: All Corrupted Zones cleared
trophies.description: Killed all the corrupted machines in every Corrupted Zone.

trophies.name: All machines catalogued
trophies.description: Encountered and Focus scanned every type of machine.

trophies.name: First Vantage found
trophies.description: Found and accessed a Vantage datapoint.

trophies.name: First Metal Flower found
trophies.description: Discovered a strange metal flower.

trophies.name: First Banuk Figure found
trophies.description: Found a wooden effigy left by a Banuk traveler.

trophies.name: First Ancient Vessel found
trophies.description: Found an ancient vessel once used by the Old Ones.

trophies.name: All Vantages found
trophies.description: Found and accessed all of the Vantage datapoints.

trophies.name: All Metal Flowers found
trophies.description: Found all of the Metal Flowers.

trophies.name: All Banuk Figures found
trophies.description: Found all of Arnak's figures.

trophies.name: All Ancient Vessels found
trophies.description: Found all the Ancient Vessels.

trophies.name: Got the Shield-Weaver outfit
trophies.description: Recovered an ancient technology and put it to use.

trophies.name: Followed Rost's teachings
trophies.description: Learned to hunt and fight alongside Rost.

trophies.name: Defeated the Sawtooth
trophies.description: Defeated the Sawtooth that threatened the Nora.

trophies.name: Triumphed in the Proving
trophies.description: Overcame adversity and placed first in the Proving.

trophies.name: Fought back the corruption
trophies.description: Destroyed the corruption inside the Nora valley.

trophies.name: Learned of the ancient past
trophies.description: Learned of the ancient past at Maker's End.

trophies.name: Crashed the Eclipse network
trophies.description: Infiltrated the Eclipse battle camp and crashed their network.

trophies.name: Discovered the truth
trophies.description: Discovered the truth of Zero Dawn.

trophies.name: Broke the siege of All-Mother
trophies.description: Defeated the invaders and went inside the sacred mountain.

trophies.name: Recovered a powerful weapon
trophies.description: Explored the Mountain That Fell and recovered a powerful weapon.

trophies.name: All allies joined
trophies.description: Given Aloy's actions, all possible optional allies joined the defense.

trophies.name: Ended the war machine threat
trophies.description: Ended the threat of the ancient war machines.

trophies.name: Victorious with the War-Chief
trophies.description: Found the Nora War-Chief and defeated the killers in the Ring of Metal.

trophies.name: Saved Meridian from its foe
trophies.description: Helped Erend investigate Ersa's fate, and foiled a plot against Meridian.

trophies.name: Aided the defectors
trophies.description: Aided the escapes of Uthid and the child king Itamen from the Shadow Carja.

trophies.name: Hunted Redmaw with Talanah
trophies.description: Rose through the ranks of the Hunters Lodge and helped Talanah defeat Redmaw.

trophies.name: Enjoy Your Powers
trophies.description: Collect all trophies.

trophies.name: Unstoppable
trophies.description: Finish the game on Expert difficulty.

trophies.name: Sacrifice
trophies.description: Risk your freedom to protect those you care about.

trophies.name: Ruthless
trophies.description: Look out for yourself, no matter the consequences.

trophies.name: Temperance
trophies.description: Practice self-control.

trophies.name: Malice
trophies.description: Get them before they get you.

trophies.name: Courage
trophies.description: Stand up for the helpless.

trophies.name: Contempt
trophies.description: Don't fear the weak.

trophies.name: Mercy
trophies.description: Everyone deserves a second chance.

trophies.name: Revenge
trophies.description: An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth.

trophies.name: Justice
trophies.description: Expose the corruption of the powerful.

trophies.name: Dominance
trophies.description: Show the world that nobody can protect them.

trophies.name: Reconciliation
trophies.description: Finish the story with Good Karma.

trophies.name: Rebellion
trophies.description: Finish the story with Evil Karma.

trophies.name: Everybody Out
trophies.description: Rescue 10 suspects from suspicion pens.

trophies.name: Spin-off
trophies.description: Beat down 10 sign twirlers.

trophies.description: Take out 10 street musicians.

trophies.description: Bust 10 drug dealers.

trophies.description: Disrupt 10 activist rallies.

trophies.description: Kill 10 obnoxious Akuran gang members.

trophies.description: Rescue 10 escaped conduits from angry mobs.

trophies.name: Walk It Off
trophies.description: Heal 10 wounded civilians.

trophies.description: Finish off 10 wounded enemies or civilians.

trophies.name: True Hero
trophies.description: Achieve Level 5 Good Karma.

trophies.name: Infamous
trophies.description: Achieve Level 5 Evil Karma.

trophies.description: Collect half the Blast Shards.

trophies.description: Comet Drop over 170 meters.

trophies.description: Stay in the air for more than 45 seconds.

trophies.name: Hat Trick
trophies.description: Defeat an enemy using three different power sources.

trophies.name: Double Smoke Stack Attack
